sentences.en: Control yourself , sir. These outbursts of petulance are not seemly.
sentences.cn: 您哪, 就克制点吧. 这么使性子可不像话.

sentences.en: Even so, the writers and broadcasters didn't take kindly to Kobe's selfishness, arrogance and petulance.
sentences.cn: 即便如此, 专栏作家和解说们并不放过科比的自私 、 傲慢和小脾气.

sentences.en: He tore up the manuscript in a fit of petulance.
sentences.cn: 他一怒之下把手稿撕碎了.

sentences.en: His impolite manners incurred her petulance.
sentences.cn: 他不礼貌的举动激怒了她.
他的任性让她无法忍受。

sentences.en: Zeus's pride and petulance became more and more intolerable.
sentences.cn: 宙斯的傲气和喜怒无常的脾气实在太叫人难以忍受.
